name: Unfinished Projects (LLGM)
description:
A collection of unfinished projects

Project #1 Controls:
W,A,S,D - Movement
LMB - Grab/Shoot
E - Enter Car/Equip Rifle
G - Drop Rifle
SPACE - Break

Project #2 Controls:
W,A,S,D - Movement
SPACE - Jump
LMB - Shoot

Project #3 Controls:
LMB - Select Settler
RMB - Select Tile

Project #4 Controls:
W,A,S,D - Movement
LMB/SPACE - Attack

Project #5 Controls:
W,A,S,D - Movement
LMB - Shoot
SPACE - Roll
E - Interact

Project #6 Controls:
SHIFT - Forward Thrust
A,D - Turn
Q/Scroll Wheel - Change View
